title: It’s a Waste to Stay at Home!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Yoshiko! Wake up!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh!? Uh...... What? Why are you in my room...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Your mom said it’d be okay for me to come in. Anyway, you’re quite the sleepyhead, Yoshiko. Come on. Get up, get up. Get dressed, get dressed.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait...... I was up late streaming last night, so I’m still sleepy! And it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The sunlight will wake you up~ Here, I’ll open the curtains!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s so bright~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Okay, you’ll wear this today, and this is your bag. I’ll do your hair too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Seriously, what is with you.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s Golden Week! It’d be a waste not to go out and have fun. Let’s go on an adventure together~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>An adventure!? Where are you planning to take me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>If I told you now, it wouldn’t be an adventure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, tell me!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>If you guess correctly, I’ll tell you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What do you mean, “If I guess correctly”!? That’s suspicious! Where are we going!? Tell meeee~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
